name: Cube - explosions and time
description:
Cube - [explosions and time]

This is the first game I have ever made, finished on the 30th of September, delayed upload because of procrastination but it's my birthday tomorrow so I might as well. Made using  Brackeys tutorial.  It is a 3D arcade runner. It is a simple game with explosions and time rewinding. Learnt a lot through this tutorial and I am excited to make more.

Looking for suggestions on Scoring Systems, powerups and general feedback :D Thanks for playing 

WebGL coming  Soon
